HORACE S. WHITMAN v. THE UNITED STATES CHARLES RECHT v. THE UNITED STATES ROSE WEISS v. THE UNITED STATES H. ROZIER DULANY, Jr. v. THE UNITED STATES OSMOND K. FRAENKEL v. THE UNITED STATES WILLIAM L. RAWLS AND WILLIAM L. MARBURY, Jr. v. THE UNITED STATES RUSSELL H. ROBBINS v. THE UNITED STATES FREDERIC R. COUDERT, PAUL FULLER, Jr., FREDERIC R. COUDERT, Jr., THOMAS K. FINLETTER, JAMES E. HOPKINS, MAHLON B. DOING, FREDERICK C. BELLINGER, THOMAS W. KELLY, GEORGE S. MONTGOMERY, Jr., AND PERCY A. SHAY, copartners doings business under the firm name and style of COUDERT BROTHERS, v. THE UNITED STATES VICTOR E. GARTZ v. THE UNITED STATES BORIS BRASOL v. THE UNITED STATES *742BASIL B. ELIASHEVITCH v. THE UNITED STATES *741No. 44029 No. 44030 No. 44031 No. 44033 No. 44034 No. 44041 No. 44188 No. 44354 No. 44392 No. 44393 *742No. 44487 [Decided March 2, 1942] Mr. Horace S. Whitman, with whom was Mr. Osmond K. FraemJeel, for the plaintiff in No. 44030. Mr. H. J. Gerrity for the plaintiff in No. 44188. Mr. Mahlon B. Doing for the plaintiff in No. 44354. Mr. J. F. Staley for the defendant in each case.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
